overview:
At Fixmo, Lee Cocking is responsible for overall Product Management and has direct ownership of the Sentinel Product.

Heâ€™s spent 14 years in technology, and the last 10 focusing on mobile enterprise technology. Prior to Joining Fixmo Lee spent nearly a decade working on BlackBerry at RIM, ranging in roles of Premier Support, Development and Product Management. Before leaving RIM Lee managed core components of the BlackBerry Enterprise Solution, including Messaging/Calendaring, Monitoring and supporting tools including the BlackBerry Resource Kit, Performance Engineering Resource Kit, and the BlackBerry Enterprise Transporter (of which he was also a contributing developer).

Lee has co-authored several patents on monitoring mobile systems. He is passionate about technology, customer service and delivering quality software, and will be focusing his creative intelligence on delivering innovative products that solve real problems.
